entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suspicious code in RuntimeCompatibilityWrapNonExceptionThrows property #70465
  • Use of InterceptsLocationAttribute should produce an error in VB #70461
  • EnableGenerateDocumentationFile analyzer is a breaking change #70460
    17.8
  • C# completion offered for explicit static interface method declaration generates code with several issues #70458
  • Obsolete PreserveLocalVariables #70450

Closed

  • CS1591 code fix should offer "<inheritdoc />" for explicit static interface method implementations #70456
  • VB Hot Reload bug #70198
    17.9
  • IDE0047 Needs better clarity for dotnet templates #70459
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34219.48 #70462
  • Interceptors feature doesn't work for VB - doc omission? gap? #70387
    17.9
  • Contract failure in AbstractPullDiagnosticHandler.GetIdToPreviousDiagnosticParams #66107
    17.9
  • Only suggestions for types are shown after typing `.` following `is SomeType` pattern #70226
  • Constant folding doesn't work correctly sometimes #70437
  • IDE0051 false positive #68162
  • Add Explicit Return Type in C# #67409

PullRequests

Created

  • Test CI with version only change #70471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test CI #70470
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add restricted IVT to Coplit Chat for code mapper service API #70468
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure diagnostics are logged before proceeding with further project loading #70467
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Front load extract-method syntax and semantic checks. #70466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce the work done by remove unreachable analyzer when calculating diagnostics #70455
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Enc: Clean up SemanticEdit #70449
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Collection expressions: spread elements are not expressions #70417
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.9 #70463
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix incorrect contract in VB EnC analyzer #70464
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Update config file after 17.9 branch is created #70442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Filter completion list only with text before cursor #70448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix TriggerOnTyping to not block explicit invoking completion #70444
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • docs - note that interceptors are C# only #70457
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Prevent StringBuilder resizes during SyntaxNode.GetText #70447
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Handle missing ISimplificationService implementation for non-C#/VB languages #70425
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, Next
  • Improve completion in the context of pattern expressions #70262
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Clear 'run code analysis' results when a build completes #70412
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add refactoring to convert a primary-constructor-parameter to a normal constructor. #70399
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Bump MSBuild.StructuredLogger package version #70157
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Ensure the VSCode server process runs on non-preview runtime #70446
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Ensure evaluation results are included in binlog #70472
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool instances of SymbolDisplayVisitor #70363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Update ExternalAccess for EditorConfig #70415
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix character offset off-by-one error in enhanced line directives #70247
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Connect inline rename UI to editor smart rename session #70420
    Area-IDE, untriaged, 17.9
  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #70401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure bulk included diagnostic IDs for Code cleanup only fix Warning/Error diagnostics #70353
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
